duties_responsibilities.duty: Coordinate the handling, tracking, planning, and distribution of all hardware products within the organization.
Lead a team responsible for managing shipping, delivery, and international documentation.
Ensure compliance with intake form and shipping QA standards.
Manage tools used for request and deployment creation, and develop new tools for deployment.
Handle internal order management, prototype asset creation, team scheduling, delegation of workload, and ownership assignment.
Provide team training and ensure adherence to product confidentiality and safe equipment operation standards.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent. Bachelor's degree in Logistics, Supply Chain Management, or related field preferred.
